title: Challenge-Based Learning Simulation for Developing Interdisciplinary Project Management Efficacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and fundamental project management concepts
context.additional_context: Students from diverse departments form teams to solve real-world social problems in a simulation-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflicts arising in interdisciplinary teams through VR simulations and propose resolution strategies
Learners can design and implement interdisciplinary collaboration processes to solve real-world social problems via challenge-based learning (CBL) tasks
Learners develop metacognitive strategies to assess and enhance self-efficacy during project progress
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
